name: Santaur's Special Delivery
description:
Help Santaur spread holiday cheer!

The more presents you carry the harder it is to fly.

Elfs keep the presents coming for 2 minutes, watch out for tall buildings!

 Score increases with delivery accuracy.

Controls:

Spacebar = Drop a present, lightening your load to fly higher
Left or Right Arrow Keys = Move right or left Enter = Select

Advanced Players - Utilize the down arrow to drop faster. Try using this to dodge elfs, and keep your load light!


Our 10th Ludum Dare in a row!
Website = https://zambo.fun
from Kansas City, MO - USA  (minus halfskye)

Twitter = https://twitter.com/zambonimacaroni
